settings.question: SHIPPING POLICY
settings.answer:
Domestic delivery times for collectibles typically take 5-10 business days or longer after processing. International delivery times can take up to 21 business days or longer depending on location. International orders may be subject to customs delays and duty fees, which we have no control over.

For more information about shipping, please visit here. Please allow additional time for custom items and collectibles.

settings.question: RETURNS & EXCHANGES
settings.answer:
If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase from Pudgy Penguins, you can return your qualifying item(s) for a full refund within 30 days of delivery. Returns must be unopened with the original tags attached (including the security tag, if applicable) and with the original packaging; returned merchandise that does not satisfy these requirements may not qualify for a refund.

With limited collection drops, all sales are final. We have no control over items and packaging that are damaged in transit. Please file a claim with the courier associated with the tracking. To initiate a return, please contact us at support@pudgypenguins.io. For our returns and exchanges policy, you can find it here.

settings.question: What happens when a collectible is sold out?
settings.answer: If an item is listed as sold out, it is unavailable for purchase. Please email us at support@pudgypenguins.io for more information.
